text: The High Cost of Health: Analyzing America’s Healthcare Affordability Crisis" - a new report that highlights the unaffordable reality of healthcare in America. 🤯💸🏥 Did you know that Americans can only afford an average monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical costs? 😱 The report also shows that many people are skipping necessary care, like preventive visits and prescription drugs, due to the high cost. 🤕 It's time for a change! PayZen is tackling this issue head-on with AI-powered solutions to make healthcare more affordable for all Americans. 💪🏽🔍 Read the full report to learn more about the crisis and how we can work together towards a better, more affordable healthcare system.
